items.name: Sol Cut
implicitMods: You cannot be Cursed with Silence
Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: +14 to Strength
15% increased Lightning Damage
7% increased maximum Energy Shield
5% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Eagle Curio
explicitMods: 14% increased Global Accuracy Rating
+9% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+18% to Critical Strike Multiplier with One Handed Melee Weapons
14% increased Damage with One Handed Weapons
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Plague Solace
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: Regenerate 0.1% of Life per Second
1 Added Passive Skill is Advance Guard
1 Added Passive Skill is Martial Prowess
1 Added Passive Skill is Veteran Defender
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 4% increased maximum Energy Shield
5% increased maximum Life
4% increased maximum Mana
54% increased Attack Damage while affected by Precision
Regenerate 2.27% of Energy Shield per Second while affected by Discipline
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Megalomaniac
explicitMods: Adds 4 Passive Skills
Added Small Passive Skills grant Nothing
1 Added Passive Skill is Martial Prowess
1 Added Passive Skill is Electric Presence
1 Added Passive Skill is Sublime Sensation
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: If you're going to act like you're better than everyone else, make sure you are.

items.name: Dragon Shine
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket

Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Trap Damage
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Mine Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Intelligence
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Strength
1 Added Passive Skill is Guerilla Tactics
1 Added Passive Skill is Set and Forget
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Pyromaniac if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Pyromaniac if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

5.name: Attack Damage while holding a Shield
stats: 12% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield

7.name: Advance Guard
stats: Attack Skills deal 30% increased Damage while holding a Shield
Ignore all Movement Penalties from Armour
5% increased Movement Speed while holding a Shield

10.name: Attack Damage while holding a Shield
stats: 12% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield

11.name: Veteran Defender
stats: +15% Elemental Resistances while holding a Shield
reminderText: (Attributes are Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence)
(Armour, Evasion Rating and Energy Shield are the standard Defences)

0.name: Attack Damage while holding a Shield
stats: 12% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield

3.name: Martial Prowess
stats: 20% increased Damage with Ailments from Attack Skills
reminderText: (Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)

1000.name: Attack Damage while holding a Shield Mastery

15.name: Electric Presence
stats: Wrath has 50% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
reminderText: (Lightning Ailments are Shocked and Sapped)

16.name: Martial Prowess
stats: 20% increased Damage with Ailments from Attack Skills
reminderText: (Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)

35.name: Set and Forget
stats: 40% increased Trap Trigger Area of Effect
Skills used by Traps have 15% increased Area of Effect

32.name: Guerilla Tactics
stats: 5% increased Movement Speed if you've thrown a Trap or Mine Recently
reminderText: (Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)
